column4: Can anyone think of a reason why my windows box can't reach my linux box, but my laptop can?
can't reach as in cant even ping?
correct.  Can not ping, ssh, or access the websites via ip.  I'm using putty to connect to 192.168.1.99
that sounds like a problem with the windows box
no idea.  It used to work.
well obviously something has changed, have you installed/uninstalled anything recently (on either machine)?
have you tried the other way round? Ie contacting the windows machine from the linux machine?
nothing I can really do to connect.  DOes windows return pings by default?
how about the connecting from the laptop that can reach linux to the machine that can't, does that work?
the laptop can't reach the windows machine either.
that's definitely a problem with the windows machine then
have you tried turning off the firewall entirely?
well try that, you'll at least find out if it's a firewall issue or not before you beat your head against firewall settings trying to make it work
I just did.  It still times out.
